definition: definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: The reduced wind shear means that upper-level winds are less likely to disrupt hurricane formation.
sentences.chinese: 减弱风切变意味着高空风不太可能影响飓风的形成。

sentences.english: The occurrence of high shear stress at the fibre end is a factor which is expected to lead to crack generation .
sentences.chinese: 在纤维端部存在高切变应力视为导致产生裂缝的因素。

sentences.english: Tidal pumping and vertical shearing are the principal factors leading to distinctions.
sentences.chinese: 潮泵作用和垂向切变作用是造成两者差别的主要原因。

sentences.english: The shear velocity above the canopy is larger than that within the canopy.
sentences.chinese: 冠层内水流切变流速的减小有利于粘性泥沙的沉积。

sentences.english: When the shear line vapour band is weak, and the Plateau shear line will move southeastward.
sentences.chinese: 切变线水汽带减弱时，高原切变线东南移。

sentences.english: When the shear line vapour band is weak, and the Plateau shear line will move southeastward.
sentences.chinese: 切变线水汽带减弱时，高原切变线东南移。

sentences.english: In this paper, the stability and control of a hingeless helicopter in wind shear were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了无铰直升机在风切变场中的稳定性和操纵性。

sentences.english: At the same time, detailed experimental studies of turbulent shear flows were being made .
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，湍流切变流的详细实验研究也在进行。

sentences.english: Acquires wind speed, direction, shear, veer, TI, and inclination data.
sentences.chinese: 风速，风向，风切变，湍流强度以及倾斜数据。

sentences.english: We have a "Wind-shear Ahead" warning. Request to delay our approach.
sentences.chinese: 我们出现了“前方风切变”警告，请示推迟进近。

sentences.english: The calculation of shear strain for simple plane shear deformation was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 该文研究平面简单切变过程中切应变的计算。

sentences.english: The cloud bands originate from the convergence along the typhoon shear lines.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现台风内存在三条切变线。

sentences.english: A double trapezoidal specimen will generate shear debonding .
sentences.chinese: 双梯形的试样将产生切变脱胶现象。

sentences.english: The groove is intended to catch at the shear line as a deterrent to picking.
sentences.chinese: 凹槽是为了赶上在作为一种威慑切变线到采摘。

sentences.english: There are three Shear lines existing in typhoon originated in ITCZ.
sentences.chinese: 产生在ITCZ内的台风中存在三条切变线。

sentences.english: The continuous spectrums occur to overlap with the increase of wind shear.
sentences.chinese: 随着风切变的增大，连续谱发生重叠。
